meanings.definition: Having a strong liking or affection for someone or something.
meanings.sent1: My fondest memories are of playing in the park with my friends.
meanings.sent2: She expressed her fondest feelings towards her beloved pet.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its fondest love by purring loudly whenever its owner entered the room.
meanings.sent4: His fondest dreams revolved around traveling the world and exploring new cultures.
meanings.sent5: The fondest smile lit up her face when she saw her long-lost friend.

meanings.definition: Showing great care or tenderness towards someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The nurse's fondest touch comforted the patient during a difficult time.
meanings.sent2: He always wore his fondest expression when helping others in need.
meanings.sent3: The fondest gesture of kindness was when the child offered his last cookie to his friend.
meanings.sent4: The fondest embrace enveloped her in warmth and reassurance.
meanings.sent5: Her fondest gaze towards the newborn baby was filled with love and protection.
